Articles.Content: Someone got any idea how to calculate current gravity vector / direction towards local center of gravity in relation to part?

FlightGlobals.ActiveVessel.mainBody.transform.position will give you the centre of the current celestial body.


FlightGlobals.ActiveVessel.mainBody.transform.position - this.vessel.transform.position;

ought to give you a vector pointing straight down. I think. Could be the other way around. Or you could do


SomeTransformInYouPart.transform.LookAt(FlightGlobals.ActiveVessel.mainBody.transform.position);

to make an object point down. And by down, I mean the centre of gravity in the current SOI

HTH?
